Title: My Life in Film
Actors: Alice Lowe, Andrew Scott, Kris Marshall, Robert Craigs
Plot: Art is an independent film-maker with big ideas... sadly nobody will listen to these ideas, with the exception of his best friend Jones. The series follows Art as his overactive imagination turns every day into a cinematic classic, with homages to 'Top Gun' and 'The Shining' to name but a few.
